Class FirebaseWaitlistRepository

java.lang.Object
com.EventEase.data.firebase.FirebaseWaitlistRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
WaitlistRepository
public class FirebaseWaitlistRepository extends Object implements WaitlistRepository
Firebase implementation of WaitlistRepository. Uses Firestore for persistent waitlist storage and management.
